function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inequitable access to digital services and technologies, exacerbating urban inequalities and infrastructure issues.","category":"Access to infrastructure  ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on traditional behavioral aspects and lack of adoption of contactless technologies leading to continued risk of disease transmission and reduced pandemic containment efforts.","category":"Health Behaviors and Compliance","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited access to internet and digital solutions in least developed countries ldcs","category":"Access to infrastructure  ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased urban density and the use of digital replicas in smart cities may impact public health and safety","category":"Physical activity and mobility","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on old-school drawing culture and impersonal autocad representations due to contemporary addiction to digital narrative rich television shows and movies","category":"Cultural and Lifestyle Risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased reliance on remote working and xr technology may lead to decreased social interaction and community cohesion, increasing the risk of mental health issues and social isolation.","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The use of xr technology and virtual environments could lead to decreased physical activity and an associated increase in sedentary behavior, leading to health issues.","category":"Physical activity and mobility","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shift towards less face-to-face human interactions due to the outbreak of covid-19","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of planning and management leading to ostracism, racism, and social conflict","category":"Social Justice Concerns","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Hoarding of basic commodities and spreading fear","category":"Social Justice Concerns","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Complex social systems
